reviewText: Clearly, these videos were taken over a long stretch of time. If they are all you have, they are priceless. He was an interesting fellow and I would put this DVD in the category of home movies--a bit grainy and not high quality at all. Nevertheless, I enjoyed it.

I first saw this years ago and continue to find it one of the best overviews of the life and work of R. Buckminster Fuller. This DVD, created by his son-in-law, offers a glimpse into the incredible brilliance of the "Planet's friendly genius". Bucky was ahead of his time, purposely, and many of his predictions from 50+ years ago are coming into reality now. I enjoy the clarity of this work.
